### latest updates

<p>
<div class = "blue">

<font size="2"> **June 3, 2020** </font><br>
Together with Prof. Dante Mantini, we are recruiting a PhD student to work on the influence of a decline in somatosensory function on motor control and learning. Vacancy is available [here](https://www.kuleuven.be/personeel/jobsite/jobs/55671291?hl=en&lang=en)
Note, the candidate has to be fluent in Dutch as s/he has to act as teaching assistant in that language
</div>
<br>

<div class = "blue">

<font size="2"> **June 1st, 2020** </font><br>
Never forget to submit your paper as preprint first! We did forget to do it for this one but after being **4 months under review at Gait&Posture**, we decided that it was enough. Preprint entitled "Validation of a smartphone embedded inertial measurement unit for measuring postural stability in older adults" is available [here](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.05.29.123620v1)

</div>
<br>

<div class = "blue">

<font size="2"> **May 27, 2020** </font><br>
Together with Prof. Dante Mantini, we are recruiting a post-doc to work on EEG and motor adaptation. Vacancy is available [here](https://www.kuleuven.be/personeel/jobsite/jobs/55671214?hl=en&lang=en)

</div>
<br>
<div class = "blue">
 <font size="2"> __May 9, 2020__ </font><br>
Koen Vandevoorde got his paper accepted in Journal of Neurophysiology. Preprint is available [here](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/753160v1)
</div>
<br>
<div class = "blue">
<font size="2"> __March 31, 2020__ </font><br>
Congrats to Guy Rens who got his paper entitled [Sensorimotor Expectations Bias Motor Resonance during Observation of Object Lifting: The Causal Role of pSTS]( https://doi.org/10.1523/JNEUROSCI.2672-19.2020) accepted in Journal of Neuroscience.
</div>
<br>
<div class = "blue">
<font size="2"> __Januari 20, 2020__ </font><br>
With Prof. Friedl De Groote, we submitted a paper entitled "_Validation of a smartphone embedded inertial measurement unit for measuring postural stability in older adults_" to Gait&Posture.
</div>
